00001 package modelManagement;
00002 
00003 import java.util.Hashtable;
00004 
00005 import modelManagement.exceptions.InvalidModelException;
00006 
00007 import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.Diagnostic;
00008 import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
00009 import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource;
00010 import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.Diagnostician;
00011 
00012 public class ModelValidator {
00013 
00014         Resource resource;
00015         Hashtable<EObject, String> invalidObjects;
00016         StringBuffer strBuffer;
00017         
00018         public ModelValidator(Resource resource) {
00019                 this.resource   = resource;
00020                 invalidObjects  = new Hashtable<EObject, String>();
00021         }
00022         
00023         public void doIt() throws InvalidModelException {
00024                 validateEachElement();
00025                 
00026                 if (! invalidObjects.isEmpty() ) {
00027                         throw new InvalidModelException( invalidObjects );
00028                 }
00029         }
00030 
00034         private void validateEachElement() {
00035                 for (EObject eObject : resource.getContents()) {
00036                         addToListIfInvalid(eObject);
00037                 }
00038         }
00039 
00040         private void addToListIfInvalid(EObject eObject) {
00041                 if (! validateEObject(eObject) ) {
00042                         invalidObjects.put(eObject, strBuffer.toString());
00043                 }               
00044         }
00045         
00046         private Boolean validateEObject(EObject eObject) {
00047                 Diagnostic diagnostic = Diagnostician.INSTANCE.validate(eObject);
00048                 if (diagnostic.getSeverity() != Diagnostic.OK) {
00049                         resetStringBuffer();
00050                         printDiagnostic(diagnostic, "");
00051                         return false;
00052                 }
00053                 return true;
00054         }
00055 
00056         private void resetStringBuffer() {
00057                 //I don't know how to reset a buffer, so I create a new one.
00058                 strBuffer = new StringBuffer(500);
00059         }
00060 
00061         private void printDiagnostic(Diagnostic diagnostic, 
00062                         String indent) {
00063                 recordIndentedMessage(diagnostic.getMessage(), indent);
00064                 for (Diagnostic child : diagnostic.getChildren()) {
00065                         printDiagnostic(child, indent + "  ");
00066                 }
00067         }
00068 
00073         private void recordIndentedMessage(String message, String indent) {
00074                 strBuffer.append(indent);
00075                 strBuffer.append(message);
00076                 strBuffer.append('\n');
00077         }
00078 }
